summary: Website project based on Draft 57/58, requiring a working Live deployment with an admin page and admin access granted to a specified Principal ID.
architectural_notes: Admin authorization is principal-based and managed in backend/authorization/access-control.mo (admin allowlist).
Requirement: only a single admin (the provided Principal ID), not multiple admins.
known_issues: Build/deploy attempts failed to complete when trying to apply admin access changes (AI unable to implement in prior attempts).

existing_features.title: Ensure the Admin page works in Live format end-to-end: admin navigation to /admin is accessible, AdminGuard correctly verifies admin status against the deployed backend, and the admin dashboard functionality (orders view + product import) works for the configured admin principal.
